title: Tender for Supply, Installation & After - Sales Services of 01 No. MRI Scanner for the National Hospital of Sri Lanka (NHSL)
decision_details: - The MRI Scanner presently installed at the National Hospital is about 15 years old and as such, it is essential to procure a new MRI Scanner for the National Hospital.  Accordingly, the proposal made by Hon. Faizal Casim, the Acting Minister of Health, Nutrition and Indigenous Medicine, to award the Tender for Supply, Installation and After Sales Services of 01 No. MRI Scanner for the NHSL, to the lowest responsive bidder, as per the recommendation of the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
